resources.string: A demonstration of a RecyclerView Adapter with ViewHolders of one type. See NumberViewHolder.

A demonstration of a RecyclerView Adapter with ViewHolders of multiple types. Notice both NumberViewHolder and StringViewHolder are used for this Adapter. This data is also updated using LiveData after a delay.

A demonstration of a RecyclerView Adapter with ViewHolders of two types, one of which is a child of the other. See ChildViewHolder and ParentViewHolder. Notice the child\'s bind overrides the parent\'s.

A demonstration of a RecyclerView Adapter with one ViewHolder type that implements DiffComparable. Notice in MainActivity that the entire list is repopulated each time a new value is added, but since the ViewHolder implements DiffComparable and we use updateDataset on the adapter, only new or changed items are added and changed.
